Statement of Auditor of Public Accounts 77 STATE OF NEBRASKA Office of the Auditor of Public Accounts It is hereby certified that the foregoing are true statements of the appropria - tions made and the moneys expended by the Thirty-seventh Session of the Legislature of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the twenty-eighth day of May, 1919, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid, as provided by Section 22, Article III, of the constitution. IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my official seal this 28th day of May, 1919. 1919. GEORGE W. MARSH, (SEAL Auditor of Public Accounts. Attest: JNO. W. REINHARDT, Deputy.
